entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
